caption:
This photograph captures a young male standing on a rocky beach with his feet partially submerged in the water. The individual is dressed for water activities, wearing orange-patterned swim shorts and is equipped with a snorkel mask pushed up onto his forehead and a swim fin in one hand, suggestive of recent or impending snorkeling. His expression is neutral as he looks directly at the camera.

The environment around him includes a coastline filled with uneven rocks and sparse vegetation visible in the background. The sky is mostly clear with a few clouds, indicating good weather conditions for outdoor activities. The sea is calm, reflecting a peaceful setting. This image likely portrays an enjoyable, recreational day at the beach, focused on water sports or exploration.
title: On Saturday, schoolboys from Lanai City go out to dive for octopus--a delicacy which represents good money if sold to local markets.
